MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 02-NOV-2020 15:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY23 postcode area of Aberyswyth affecting properties in Lledrod, Llanafan and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.30PM to  make urgent repairs to our overhead line network after  damage from a fallen tree. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:47PM on 2nd November 2020
